v.v: God stands in heaven in a meeting of all the spirits whom he has placed in charge of what he created.
You must defend people who are poor and orphans;
Rescue them from the power of the wicked people!”
Those rulers do not know or understand anything!
I previously said to them, “You think you are gods!
but you will die as people do;
God, arise and judge everyone on the earth

v: He tells them that he has decided this:
you must no longer make decisions that favor wicked people!
you must act fairly toward those who are needy and those who have no one to help them.
and as a result of their corrupt behavior,
it is as though the foundation of the world is being shaken!
It is as though you are all my sons,
your lives will end as the lives of all rulers end.”
because all the people groups belong to you!
